ffopportunity: Models for Fantasy Football Expected Points

Source: R/ffopportunity-package.R
ffopportunity-package.Rd

Downloads expected fantasy points data from 'ffverse' repositories if available, and otherwise builds up expected points data by applying models to 'nflverse' play-by-play data.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://ffopportunity.ffverse.com

  • https://github.com/ffverse/ffopportunity

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/ffverse/ffopportunity/issues
